text: харі харає намах кришна ядава̄я намах
translation: O Lord Hari, O Lord Krishna, I offer my obeisances to You, who are known as Yādava, Hari, Mādhava, and Keśava.
O Gopāla, Govinda, Rāma, Śrī Madhusūdan, Giridhārī, Gopīnāth, Madana-mohan!
All glories to Śrī Chaitanya and Nityānanda. All glories to the moonlike Śrī Advaita Āchārya. All glories to Śrī Gadādhara Paṇḍit and all the devotees of Śrī Chaitanya headed by Śrīvās Ṭhākur.
Allgloriesto Śrī Rūpa Goswāmī, Sanātan Goswāmī, Raghunāth Bhaṭṭa Goswāmī, Śrī Jīva Goswāmī, Gopāla Bhaṭṭa Goswāmī, and Raghunāth Dās Goswāmī.

text: еі чхой ґоса̄ір корі чарана вандана
translation: I offer my obeisances to the Six Goswāmīs. By offering them my obeisances all obstacles to devotion are destroyed and all spiritual desires are fulfilled.

text: еі чхой ґоса̄ір джа̄нра муі та̄нра да̄са
translation: I am a servant of that person who is a servant of these six Goswāmīs. The dust of their holy feet is my five kinds of foodstuffs.

text: та̄ндера чарана себі бгакта сане ва̄са
translation: This is my desire, that birth after birth I may live with those devotees who serve the lotus feet of these six Goswāmīs.

text: еі чхой ґоса̄і джабе врадже коіла̄ ва̄са
translation: When these six Goswāmīs lived in Vraja they revealed and explained the eternal Pastimes of Rādhā and Krishna.
Absorbing your mind in meditation upon the divine feet of the Spiritual Master and the holy Vaiṣṇavas, chant the names of Lord Hari in ecstasy, and worship the transcendental realm of Vṛndāvan.
Desiring the lotus feet of Śrī Guru and the Vaiṣṇavas, Narottam Dās sings the saṅkīrtan of the Holy Name.
